knimeNode.name: List Box Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a data table with one column holding a list of strings.

intro.p: Outputs a data table with one column holding a list of strings. The value can also be controlled from a quick form (web port).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
An undelimited list of char separators including \n and \t; back slashes and/or quotes are not supported. All tokens are used as delimiters.
If enabled empty values will be omitted from the output table and do not have to pass the check for validation.
Message that will be shown if one of the values is not valid. The character ? will be replaced by the invalid value.
A set of regular expression templates for common inputs. With the assign button you assign the regular expression and the corresponding error message to be the current settings.
The value that is selected by default.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined and the selected option as index.
